item.dc:creator: @deadangel deadangel
item.description:
@deadangel wrote:

it’s made by my best friend who’s now banned becasue a person posted starblasters ess mienr and martijntjuh downloaded it… and now he’s banned :’( it was a stupid mistake from him btw that srlsrl.scar without the / i’m working on a iron miner banker it comes in the scar sales if it got aproved and if it’s finished

item.source: Power miners and miner with bankers have a look;D

item.title: Power miners and miner with bankers have a look;D
item.dc:creator: @premier premier
item.description:
@premier wrote:

umm i havent tested but that wont work… if we space out your mining procedure a little more we see a problem:
[scar]
procedure powerminersssssssssssssss;
var
x,y,Loads,Ores,prevcount,a : integer;
begin
prevcount:=invcount;
if FindObj(X,y,‘ine’,RockColor,10) then
begin
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
a:=0;
repeat
wait(1000);
a:=a+1;
if a=3 then break;
until(invfull)
if(invfull=true)then
Loads := loads + 1;
Ores := Ores + 27;
end;
end;
[/scar]

as you can see it just repeats waiting until your inventory is fill or untill a is 3. so once a is 3 it will do whatever is next and not mine a full load. hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: Power miners and miner with bankers have a look;D

item.title: Power miners and miner with bankers have a look;D
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

God just use this: [scar]//MARTIJNTJUHS powerminer!!!///
//4th script//

{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/mining.scar}

const
RockColor=2240076;//color of the rock you wanna mine…
LoadsToDo=10000;///////loads to mien and drop hehehe

var Loads,Ores:Integer;

procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
begin //////
HowManyPlayers := 2; // Set Number of Players here. //////
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
//////
Players[0].Name := ‘scheeraap’; //Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘mafkees’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘eer’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True; //////
//////
Players[1].Name := ‘lalalala’; //Username
Players[1].Pass := ‘dfhgh’; //Password
Players[1].Nick := ‘ala’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[1].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[1].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[1].Active := True;
writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
end;

procedure powerminersssssssssssssss;
var x,y,Loads,Ores,prevcount,a:integer;
begin
prevcount:=invcount;
if FindObj(X,y,‘ine’,RockColor,10) then
begin
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
a:=0;
repeat
wait(1000);
a:=a+1;
if a=3 then break;
until(invfull)
if(invfull=true)then
Loads := loads + 1;
Ores := Ores + 27;
end;
end;

procedure FFight;
var x,y,prevcount,b,a:integer;
begin
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Writeln(‘running away!’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
FindPick;
FindGas(a, b);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
wait(1000);
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…Terminating’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure DropOre;
begin
MouseSpeed:= 13+random(7);
DropTo(2, 14);
DropTo(15, 28);
end;

procedure progressreport;
begin
WriteLn(‘Progress Report for MARTIJNTJUHS Powerminer Miner’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(Loads) + ’ Loads.’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(Ores) + ’ Ores.’);
writeln(’ ');
WriteLn(‘Made by MARTIJNTJUH’)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
DeclarePlayers;
LoginPlayer;
NickNameBMP:= CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
findpickheadcolor;
setrun(true)
repeat
RandomChatEvery(2);
RandomRClickEvery(8);
RotateEvery(3);
FindNormalRandoms;
ffight;
powerminersssssssssssssss;
if(invfull)then
DropOre;
until(Loads=LoadsToDo)
end.[/scar]

Oh and I use wizzup?'s.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @martijntjuh martijntjuh
item.description:
@martijntjuh wrote:

heey every one i maked this for posting the best powerminer you have!!!so if you have a good powerminer (it can be from some 1 else) but say it dont copy it with your name!!!
and post it so every 1 can use them…u can post 3 powerminers or something its ok for everything you can post miners with bankers also!!!thank you[br][size=1]Posted at: September 09, 2006, 03:23:58 AM[/size][hr]i just made 1 please tell me how it works…and people comon please post…

[code]//MARTIJNTJUHS powerminer!!!///
//4th script//

{.include srlsrl.scar}
{.include srlsrlskillmining.scar}

const
RockColor=2240076;//color of the rock you wanna mine…
LoadsToDo=10000;///////loads to mien and drop hehehe

var Loads,Ores:Integer;

procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
begin //////
HowManyPlayers := 2; // Set Number of Players here. //////
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
//////
Players[0].Name := ‘scheeraap’; //Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘mafkees’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘eer’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True; //////
//////
Players[1].Name := ‘lalalala’; //Username
Players[1].Pass := ‘dfhgh’; //Password
Players[1].Nick := ‘ala’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[1].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[1].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[1].Active := True;
writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
end;

procedure powerminersssssssssssssss;
var x,y,Loads,Ores,prevcount,a:integer;
begin
prevcount:=invcount;
if FindObj(X,y,‘ine’,RockColor,10) then
begin
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
a:=0;
repeat
wait(1000);
a:=a+1;
if a=3 then break;
until(invfull)
if(invfull=true)then
Loads := loads + 1;
Ores := Ores + 27;
end;
end;

procedure FFight;
var x,y,prevcount,b,a:integer;
begin
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Writeln(‘running away!’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
FindPick;
FindGas(a, b);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
wait(1000);
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…Terminating’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure DropOre;
begin
MouseSpeed:= 13+random(7);
DropTo(2, 14);
DropTo(15, 28);
end;

procedure progressreport;
begin
WriteLn(‘Progress Report for MARTIJNTJUHS Powerminer Miner’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(Loads) + ’ Loads.’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(Ores) + ’ Ores.’);
writeln(’ ');
WriteLn(‘Made by MARTIJNTJUH’)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
DeclarePlayers;
LoginPlayer;
NickNameBMP:= CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
findpickheadcolor;
setrun(true)
repeat
RandomChatEvery(2);
RandomRClickEvery(8);
RotateEvery(3);
FindNormalRandoms;
ffight;
powerminersssssssssssssss;
if(invfull)then
DropOre;
until(Loads=LoadsToDo)
end.[/code]
